events.title: Evento Oficial COP16: Bioeconom√≠a para la biodiversidad en el tr√≥pico
events.place-specific: Edificio Margarita, Av. 4 Nte. #13-99 Apto. 401, Granada, Cali, Valle del Cauca
events.description-short: En el marco de la COP16 de la CBD, expertos analizan los retos de la cadenas de valor en el tr√≥pico y su potencial para la bioeconom√≠a.
events.description-long:
La biodiversidad y los productos forestales no maderables (PFNM) representan una oportunidad crucial para los pa√≠ses tropicales, que se caracterizan por poseer una riqueza biol√≥gica excepcional y, al mismo tiempo, enfrentar desaf√≠os sociales y econ√≥micos significativos. 
Estos productos, que incluyen frutas, semillas, flores, resinas y otros recursos vegetales, est√°n profundamente integrados en los ecosistemas naturales y en las pr√°cticas tradicionales de las comunidades locales. 
La incorporaci√≥n de estos recursos en la bioeconom√≠a ofrece un camino hacia el desarrollo sostenible, pero tambi√©n plantea desaf√≠os complejos en t√©rminos de log√≠stica, tecnolog√≠a, sostenibilidad e innovaci√≥n. 
Es esencial asegurar que el aprovechamiento de estos recursos no solo genere valor agregado, sino que tambi√©n cumpla con est√°ndares ambientales, sociales y econ√≥micos, respetando el conocimiento tradicional y fortaleciendo las econom√≠as locales.

events.title: COLOMBIA BIRDS ~ Photography Workshop / Photo Tour ~ 2025
events.date-long: El evento dura 10 d√≠as y 3 horas.
events.description-short: Join Jeff Parker for this ~ COLOMBIA BIRDS ~ 2025 ~ Photography Tour & Workshop.
events.description-long:
During this all-inclusive Colombia Birds Photo Tour 2025 journey through cloud forests and high-elevation p√°ramos to photograph a variety of birds, including several endemics. With nearly 2,000 species, Colombia is home to more birds than anywhere else on Earth. 
In fact, Colombia hosts 18% of the world‚Äôs bird species even though its land only covers about 1% of the globe! The majority of our shooting takes place at easily-accessed, professionally-created bird-photography set-ups. 
With a level of biodiversity that is off the charts, plan to photograph dozens of species that include tanagers, honeycreepers, owls, toucans, antpittas, brush-finches, hummingbirds, flycatchers, toucanets, quail, chachalacas, orioles, barbets, woodpeckers‚Ä¶and more! 

LIMITED TO SIX (6) in each tour ~ ALL-INCLUSIVE ~ OFFERED TWICE in 2025 

MORE INFO: https://exploreinfocus.com/joinme/colombia-birds-photography-workshop-2025/

events.title: Gringo Tuesdays Language Exchange CALI
events.place: TERRAZA 11 GRANADA / ONCE ONCE RESTAURANTE BAR
events.place-specific: Av. 9 Nte. #15AN-41 Segundo piso, Santa Monica Residential, Cali, Valle del Cauca
events.description-short: The largest Language Exchange in Latin America
events.description-long:
Every Tuesday we host a FREE language exchange in Terraza Once Once Granada. 
It is an informal environment with organised groups, the idea being to have at least one or two native speakers per group. 
After the language exchange we have an awesome party until 3AM. 
The most popular languages that you can practice are: English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portugues and German. 
Admission is free until 9pm, after 9pm it has a value of $20.000 COP

events.title: Salsa Bar Crawl in Cali, Colombia
events.place-specific: Cl. 2 Oe. #1-71, COMUNA 3, Cali, Valle del Cauca
events.description-short: This is the Thursday Night Pub Crawl in Cali, Colombia! We will be crawling down El Pe√±on!
events.description-long:
IMPORTANT- There is a dress code for this tour! 
Guys must wear closed toed shoes on this tour. Swimwear, sandals, hats, sportswear, and sunglasses are NOT allowed! Furthermore, we do not allow any aspects of sex tourism either. 
We are a group of local friends that host bar crawls in Colombia. We wanted to give foreigners and tourists a unique 'locals experience', so we started these bar crawls. 
This bar crawl consists of 3 local bars and 1 club, all located in the nightlife district of Cali. El Pe√±on is one of the most popular nightlife areas, especially among university students and tourists, in Cali. We will meet for 1 hour at the first bar at 8:30 pm to congregate and converse. We will then proceed to the next bars every hour, finally finishing off at the salsa club by 12:15 am. Cali is known for salsa, so you must dance it at least once! 
Sometimes locals also come on our crawls, so you may have the opportunity to connect with some Colombians and practice your Spanish! 

Here are the benefits of coming on our tour: 
Bar #1- 10% off the check! 
Bar #2 - Free local cocktail with the purchase of any cocktail and 3 cocktails for 80.000 COP/person! 
Bar/Club #3 - 2x1 cocktails for Viche Mule and Viche Smash! 
Dropoff Salsa Club- Discouinted cover of 5.000 COP & 40.000 COP combo special of any beer, shot, and cocktail!

events.title: Learn to Dance Salsa @ Mariana Sabor de Cali Salsa
events.place-specific: Cra. 23a #1-90, Miraflores, Cali, Valle del Cauca
events.description-short: Experience the joy and excitement of salsa dancing with your friends in our 45-minute group salsa class at Cali Salsa Dance Studio.
events.description-long:
Join our free trial of a 45-minute group salsa class in Cali for an exciting, energetic experience. Perfect for friends or small groups, our instructors will guide you through the steps of salsa. 
Our experienced instructors create a fun and inclusive environment, providing personalized guidance and instruction tailored to the group's skill level. 
The class begins with a warm-up to get everyone comfortable and ready to dance. You'll then learn the fundamental steps and rhythms of salsa, progressing to more complex patterns and combinations as you build confidence. Whether you're new to salsa or have some experience, our instructors will ensure everyone enjoys the class and leaves with improved skills. 
Located in the heart of Cali, our studio offers an authentic salsa experience in the city known worldwide for this vibrant dance style. It's a perfect opportunity to immerse yourself in the local culture and have a great time with your group.

En Nelo Group, Nelo Space, Nelo Labs estamos comprometidos con la Innovacion Tecnologica, desde soluciones espaciales hasta innovaciones terrestres, exploraremos c√≥mo la tecnolog√≠a puede garantizar un suministro de agua puro y sostenible para todos.
